text: tatha ve (aapake saamane) kahate hain ki ham aagyaakaaree hain aur jab aapake paas se jaate hain, to unamen se kuchh log, raat mein, aapakee baat ke virudhd paraamarsh karate hain aur ve jo paraamarsh kar rahe hain, use allaah likh raha hai. atah aap unapar dhyaan na den aur allaah par bharosa karen tatha allaah par bharosa kaafee hai
